name: Déjà Vu Version 1.0.0
description:
ENJOY THE FIRST RELEASE VERSION OF Déjà Vu!!!

Releasing officially, Déjà Vu Version 1.0.0 represents an academic year of work from students at Miami University (Oxford, OH). Within this most recent version of the game, you can find a complete narrative within the catacombs of Paris, complete with unique animations and audio. In addition, feel free to enjoy up to date lighting and environmental atmosphere work.  We would be honored if you were to download our game that we have worked so hard on, and experience the journey of our troubled main character Estelle as she searches for her daughter.
